mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eka.mst_pas_sms( msp_kode_sts_sms, msp_desc_sts_sms, msp_mobile, msp_mobile2, msp_text, msp_message_date, msp_receive_date, msp_full_name, msp_identity_no, INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj_pas (reg_id, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lus_id, msps_desc) SELECT a.msp_fire_id, SYSDATE + (#{addSecond,jdbcType=INTEGER} * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, a.lssp_id, upper(trim(#{lus_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), upper(trim(#{msps_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) FROM eka.mst_pas_sms a WHERE a.msp_fire_id = upper(trim(#{reg_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) AND ROWNUM = 1
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_STS_CLIENT ( MCL_ID, LJC_ID, MSC_TGL_STS, MSC_ACTIVE ) VALUES ( #{mcl_id:VARCHAR}, #{ljc_id:INTEGER}, sysdate, #{msc_active:INTEGER} )
